item.title: Announcing The Missing ToDoist Tools
item.description:
TMTDT: The Missing ToDoist Tools ðŸŽ‰

As the name implies, TMTDT started as a small collection of scripts that I used to augment ToDoist with features they can’t/won’t implement. It’s grown quite a bit since then.

Those scripts started as simple idea and quickly morphed into a creaky, but essential, tool. As more features were added it continued too morph into an unmaintainable mess. Untangling that mess was on my todo list but never a high priority partly because of issues TMTDT was designed to solve ðŸ¤¦.
